title: Graffiti Art Watch Face
summary: Urban Street Art for your Android Wear smart watch from Karlsruhe, Germany.
description: Watch Face Features: * 24 Cool Street Art background images* New image once per hour (or manual switch)* Digital clock, configurable 12-hour mode* Weekday, Date and Battery Level in %* Ambient screen at the top of the minute* Optional Full Color Ambient mode* Choose Bold or Serif Font Typeface* Optimized for minimal battery usage* Long press on watch face for configuration* Short translucent peek cards* Android Wear smart watch required.
descriptionHTML:
Watch Face Features:

* 24 Cool Street Art background images
* New image once per hour (or manual switch)
* Digital clock, configurable 12-hour mode
* Weekday, Date and Battery Level in %
* Ambient screen at the top of the minute
* Optional Full Color Ambient mode
* Choose Bold or Serif Font Typeface
* Optimized for minimal battery usage
* Long press on watch face for configuration
* Short translucent peek cards
* Android Wear smart watch required.
comments: It's ok Won't change or if 24hr mode.
